steps: SAY THIS: 'Listen carefully. Lay him flat on his back on the floor. Remove any pillows.'
SAY THIS: 'Place the heel of your hand on the center of his chest. Put your other hand on top of that hand.'
SAY THIS: 'Push down hard and fast. You need to go at least two inches deep. Do it to the beat of the song Stayin’ Alive.'
SAY THIS: 'Don't stop. Keep pushing until the paramedics take over. I will stay on the line with you.'
SAY THIS: 'If there is a bystander, tell them to go to the front door and wave the ambulance down.'

SAY THIS: 'You are safe now. I am going to help you. Is the person who did this still nearby?'

SAY THIS: 'I’m here with you. Can you tell me exactly what you took and how much?'
